name: Nasi Goreng
description: A classic Indonesian fried rice dish, seasoned with sweet soy sauce, shrimp paste, and a blend of spices. Served with a fried egg, pickled vegetables, and prawn crackers.

name: Mie Goreng
description: Spicy and savory fried noodles, stir-fried with chicken, prawns, and vegetables. A staple of Indonesian street food.

name: Sate Ayam
description: Tender chicken skewers marinated in a flavorful blend of spices and grilled to perfection. Served with a rich and creamy peanut sauce.

name: Gado-Gado
description: A vibrant Indonesian salad featuring a mix of blanched vegetables, boiled potatoes, hard-boiled eggs, and tofu, all drizzled with a delicious peanut sauce dressing.

name: Beef Burger
description: A classic American burger with a juicy beef patty, lettuce, tomato, and cheese.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: A creamy pasta dish with bacon, eggs, and Parmesan cheese.

name: Korean Fried Chicken
description: Crispy fried chicken coated in a sweet and spicy gochujang sauce.

name: Pad Thai
description: A popular Thai noodle dish with shrimp, tofu, and a tamarind-based sauce.
